item.description:
I'll unfortunately miss this outing, but Kate, Dave and Himanshu will be looking for more players to help keep up our streak. Since we had a close game last week, but still managed to take home first, there is again a prize to be shared.

The Trivia game starts at 8PM and runs until 10PM.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Kate, Dave and Himanshu to be at the front booth by the bar.
item.why: Great conversation, fun people, a fun game, good music (usually), and an over the to trivia master.
item.name: Trivia @ Snookers
